page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Amateur Dramatics }_ the Dramatic Society produces an excellent play annually.Some members are from other parishes. {Music Group}_ produces concerts at Easter,Christmas and others by invitation throughout the year. {Carol Singing}_ the Women's Institute and Youth Club carol sing both to entertain and to raise money for the old people's lunch. {Disco's}_ held at the nearby sailing club at Helford every so often. {Whist Drives}_ in the village hall. {Cinemas}_ Penzance,Redruth,Truro are the nearest. {Video films}available locally, especially from what was Helston Cinema. {Theatre}_ Minack Theatre,Porthcurno _ summer. Occasional travelling groups. Occasional plays and concerts at Carn Brea Leisure Centre near Camborne.
